name: Kyiv-Pechersk Lavra
description:
Kyiv-Pechersk Lavra or Kyivo-Pechersâ€™ka Lavra, also known as the Kyiv Monastery of the Caves, is a historic Eastern Orthodox Christian monastery which gave its name to one of the city districts where it is located in Kyiv.

Since its foundation as the cave monastery in 1051, the Lavra has been a preeminent center of Eastern Orthodox Christianity in Eastern Europe.
